title: Unicode Support
body: can you add unicode text support

title: Feature request: limit log size
body:
Right now the log/history seems to have no limit. This way, if messages are received very fast, or if we keep the device receiving data for a long time, the application starts to be slow when updating the log/history with new values.

It would be great to have an option in "Settings" to set a maximum log size. This way, when new data is received old data is deleted if the max log size has been reached.

Maybe the size could be set in lines, rather than actual bytes.

body:
otherwise the discovery of new devices doesn't work,

see:
https://developer.android.com/reference/android/bluetooth/BluetoothDevice.html#ACTION_FOUND

title: Styles.xml error
body:
Dear admin,

How could I fix it ? Thank you very much.

title: Translate comments to English
body: First of all I would like to thank your for your application. It's relatively clear and it should be straight forward to use and/or extend it. However, I'm wondering whether it would be possible for the comments to be in English consequently?
